Fight Arena

About and How To Play:

2000 years into the future. Gladiators are back!

And your one of them! Fight for your life over and over again.

Show your honor and worth.

Keep a great streak.

Use WASD to move your character. Use L to stab.



About Me and About This Unit

In this unit I learned how to use P5.JS and I also learned more advanced CSS and Javascript than I previously knew.


My Game!
